description.plain: Jessica Darrow is a Cuban-American actress that lives with her cat in New York. She voices Luisa Madrigal in the 2021 Disney film, Encanto. She also plays Sarah in the 2019 film, Feast of Seven Fishes.

body.plain: Jessica Darrow is a Cuban-American actress that lives with her cat in New York. She voices Luisa Madrigal in the 2021 Disney film, Encanto. She also plays Sarah in the 2019 film, Feast of Seven Fishes.

songs.full_title: Surface Pressure by Jessica Darrow
songs.title: Surface Pressure

description.plain:
“Surface Pressure” is Luisa’s solo. Luisa is Mirabel’s sister, and her magical ability is that she has superhuman strength. However, as she says in this song, her strength still has its limits, as she has an emotional breakdown.

This reggaeton song written and produced by Lin-Manuel Miranda added a depth to the character with her sense of responsibility, as stated by co-writer and director Jared Bush.

songs.lyrics:
110 ContributorsTranslationsTagalog / ᜆᜄᜎᜓᜄ᜔Surface Pressure Lyrics[Intro]
I'm the strong one, I'm not nervous
I'm as tough as the crust of the Earth is
I move mountains, I move churches
And I glow, 'cause I know what my worth is
I don't ask how hard the work is
Got a rough, indestructible surface
Diamonds and platinum, I find 'em, I flatten 'em
I take what I'm handed, I break what's demanded, but

[Verse 1]
Under the surface
I feel berserk as a tightrope walker in a three-ring circus
Under the surface
Was Hercules ever like, "Yo, I don't wanna fight Cerberus?"
Under the surface
I'm pretty surе I'm worthless if I can't be of servicе
[Pre-Chorus]
A flaw or a crack, the straw in the stack
That breaks the camel's back
What breaks the camel's back, it's

[Chorus]
Pressure like a drip, drip, drip that'll never stop, whoa
Pressure that'll tip, tip, tip 'til you just go pop, whoa-oh-oh
Give it to your sister, your sister's older
Give her all the heavy things we can't shoulder
Who am I if I can't run with the ball?
If I fall to
Pressure like a grip, grip, grip, and it won't let go, whoa
Pressure like a tick, tick, tick 'til it's ready to blow, whoa-oh-oh
Give it to your sister, your sister's stronger
See if she can hang on a little longer
Who am I if I can't carry it all?
If I falter

[Verse 2]
Under the surface
I hide my nerves and it worsens, I worry somethin' is gonna hurt us
Under the surface
The ship doesn't swerve, has it heard how big the iceberg is?
Under the surface
I think about my purpose, can I somehow preserve this?
Line up the dominoes, a light wind blows
You try to stop it tumbling, but on and on it goes
You might also like[Bridge]
But wait, if I could shake the crushing weight of expectations
Would that free some room up for joy
Or relaxation, or simple pleasure?
Instead, we measure this growing pressure
Keeps growing, keep going, 'cause all we know is

[Chorus]
Pressure like a drip, drip, drip that'll never stop, whoa
Pressure that'll tip, tip, tip 'til you just go pop, whoa-oh-oh
Give it to your sister, it doesn't hurt and
See if she can handle every family burden
Watch as she buckles and bends but never breaks
No mistakes, just
Pressure like a grip, grip, grip, and it won't let go, whoa
Pressure like a tick, tick, tick 'til it's ready to blow, whoa-oh-oh
Give it to your sister and never wonder
If the same pressure would've pulled you under
Who am I if I don't have what it takes?
No cracks, no breaks
No mistakes, no pressure40Embed

songs.lyrics:
4 ContributorsA Little More Lyrics[Verse 1]
Dark, sometimes I feel alone in the dark
When I'm looking for a friend, there you are
And you know just how to steady my heart

[Verse 2]
Close, I'm hoping that we'll always stay close
Even when things are changing the most
I know that I can always come home

[Refrain]
When it only starts to change
Wish that it would stay the same
But I'll be strong the way you showed me to
[Chorus]
There in the shadow, lighting the way home
When I turn around, you're already there
Sometimes in the moment, it's hard to noticе
You're all I've been looking for, and a little morе

[Verse 3]
Lost, it's ok cause we all feel a little lost
Looking at the stars, I know just where you are
I can feel you there, you're never too far

[Refrain]
When it only starts to change
Wish that it would stay the same
But I'll be strong the way you showed me to

[Chorus]
There in the shadow, lighting the way home
When I turn around, you're already there
Sometimes in the moment, it's hard to notice
You're all I've been looking for, and a little more
You're all I've been looking for, and a little more

[Bridge]
A little more love that never leaves
A little more help me on my feet
A little of what you need me to be
You might also like[Chorus]
There in the shadow, lighting the way home
I turn around, you're already there
Sometimes in the moment, it's hard to notice
You're all I've been looking for, and a little more
You're all I've been looking for, and a little moreEmbed

description_annotation.fragment: The Top Benefits of Ceramic Tint for Your Car

range.content: The Top Benefits of Ceramic Tint for Your Car

annotatable.link_title: The Top Benefits of Ceramic Tint for Your Car by Jessica Darrow
annotatable.title: The Top Benefits of Ceramic Tint for Your Car

songs.lyrics:
1 ContributorThe Top Benefits of Ceramic Tint for Your Car LyricsAre you tired of feeling like a human oven every time you step into your car during the summer months? Do you want to protect your vehicle's interior from harmful UV rays and keep it looking new for longer? Look no further than ceramic tint! In this blog post, we'll explore the top benefits of ceramic tint for your car, including improved comfort, increased privacy, and enhanced safety. So buckle up and let's dive in!What is Ceramic Tint?If you're looking for a new way to protect your car's paint job, ceramic tint may be the perfеct solution. Ceramic tint is made from a special typе of glass that is fused with a ceramic material.

Ceramic tint also has several other benefits:

It blocks out sunlight and heat, which can make your car more comfortable in summertime. It can help keep your car's interior clean and free of dust and dirt.Types of Ceramic TintCeramic tinting is a process that uses ceramic materials to selectively block out light. This can be helpful for a number of reasons, including reducing the glare from sun and streetlights, improving privacy in your car, and protecting your vehicle's interior from damage.

There are a variety of different types of ceramic tinting available, each with its own set of benefits and drawbacks. Here are three of the most common types:

1) Solar Film Tinting: This type of tint is made up of small pieces of ceramic that are bonded to the surface of your window. When sunlight hits these tiny particles, it is refracted (bounced off) in all directions instead of entering through the window and hitting your eyes. This results in reduced glare and improved privacy while driving.

However, solar film tints can be less effective at filtering out sunlight than other types of tints. They also tend to be more expensive than other types and may not be suitable for all windows or vehicles.
2) Cold Film Tinting: Cold film tints work much like solar film tints but use cold temperatures instead of sunlight to bond the ceramic particles to the glass. This makes them more durable and resistant to fading over time, as well as providing better filtering capabilities against sunlight.

While cold film tints are generally more expensive than solar film tints, they're also less likely to cause headaches or eyestrain when used inBenefits of Ceramic Tint for Your CarThere are a number of reasons why ceramic tinting is a great choice for your car. First, it is anti-reflective, so you'll see less glare in the sunlight. Second, it resists wear and tear, meaning that your car's finish will last longer. Finally, ceramic tinting filters out both ultraviolet light and infrared radiation, which can damage your car's interior.ConclusionCeramic tinting for your car can bring a whole new level of luxury to your driving experience. Not only will you be looking good while cruising down the highway in style, but you'll also be protecting your car from the sun's harmful rays. Plus, ceramic tint is extremely low-maintenance and easy to keep clean - making it a great choice for drivers on the go. If you're interested in adding some luxurious refinement to your driving experience, consider investing in ceramic tint for your car!Embed
